item.title: My new side hobby
item.author: Author
item.description: As not many would expect, today I decided to start a new journey in Medium. Perhaps you have noticed in my about section that I have always been an enthusiast of the gaming industry. Just to put you in context I will take this as a side hobby, so at the beginning, I suggest to don’t expect me to be a highly active user in the early days. Thus for this moment, my main focus is to land a Data Analyst Job, so I will be preparing some posts on this page to let you know about my projects.
